errors.error_description: The instructions for finding command names tell the user to run a command *before* enabling command logging. This will prevent the executed command from being logged to the console.
correction_candidates: Enable logging with `sublime.log_commands(True)` before running the command from the Command Palette.
Run `sublime.log_commands(True)` and then restart Sublime Text before running the command.
Run the command and then `sublime.log_commands(True)` to see the last executed command.
errors.golden_answer: Enable logging with `sublime.log_commands(True)` before running the command from the Command Palette.
